hero.title: Professional psychological support when you need it most
hero.subtitle: Dr. Amany Johnson provides compassionate, evidence-based therapy to help you overcome challenges and achieve mental wellness.

services.title: Our Services
services.consultation_desc: Individual consultation sessions with certified specialists.
services.ctaDesc: Book a free 15-minute consultation to discuss your needs
services.subtitle: Dr. Amany Youssef provides compassionate, evidence-based therapy to help you overcome challenges and achieve mental wellness.
services.therapy_desc: Comprehensive therapeutic programs to improve mental health.

about.title: About Dr. Amany Youssef
about.name: Dr. Amany Youssef
about.p1: With over a decade of experience in clinical psychology, Dr. Amany Youssef is dedicated to providing compassionate, evidence-based mental health care. She specializes in cognitive behavioral therapy and has helped hundreds of individuals overcome their challenges.
about.p2: Dr. Amany believes in creating a safe, non-judgmental space where clients can explore their thoughts and feelings while developing practical strategies for positive change.

testimonials.title: What My Patients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from people who have found healing and growth through professional psychological support.

items.name: Jennifer M.
items.text: Dr. Johnson helped me overcome my anxiety and gave me tools that I still use today. Her compassionate approach made all the difference.

items.name: Michael R.
items.text: Professional, caring, and incredibly insightful. The online sessions were convenient and just as effective as in-person therapy.

items.name: Sarah K.
items.text: Dr. Johnson helped save my marriage. Her couples therapy sessions gave us the communication skills we desperately needed.

items.name: David L.
items.text: After struggling with depression for years, Dr. Johnson's cognitive behavioral therapy approach finally helped me find hope again.

chatbot.title: Smart Assistant
chatbot.welcome: Hello! How can I help you?
chatbot.autoReply: Thank you for your message! You will get a reply soon, insha'Allah.
chatbot.bubbleMessage: Hello! How can I help you?
chatbot.error: An error occurred while connecting to the smart assistant. Please try again later.
chatbot.introPrompt: Hello! I am a smart assistant here to help you understand the website, answer any questions about Dr. Amany, or just talk if you need to vent. Dr. Amany is a psychological specialist dedicated to supporting Muslim women through challenges.
chatbot.drInfo: Dr. Amany is 29 years old, graduated from Benha University, Faculty of Education, Department of Psychological Education in 2018, then obtained her master's degree in specialized psychology in 2023, and is now pursuing her PhD. She has worked for over two years with many cases and aims to support Muslim women psychologically. She has over half a million followers on social media and her videos have surpassed 2 million views. Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dr_amanyyousef/
chatbot.bookingSteps:
Booking steps:
1- Click on the 'Book Appointment' button
2- Choose the service you want
3- Enter your personal information
4- Select the date and time you prefer.
chatbot.paymentSteps:
How to pay?
1- You will receive a WhatsApp message from Dr. Amany's team
2- The team will handle your payment in the way that suits you best.
chatbot.servicesList:
Types of services offered:
- Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
- Stress Management
- Group Sessions
- Couples Therapy
- Online Consultation
- Crisis Support
